title: ‘Perry Mason’
description:
It took a few episodes to warm up, but ‘Perry Mason,’ starring Matthew Rhys, is a gritty and captivating detective show that doesn’t stick too close to the original series.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
